reuters.title: FRENCH CAISSE NATIONALE DES AUTOROUTES ISSUES BOND
reuters.body: Caisse Nationale des Autoroutes is issuing a three billion French franc bond, the French bond issuing committee said. The issue will be lead-managed by Caisse Nationale du Credit Agricole, Credit Lyonnais and Cie Financiere de Paribas subsidiary Credit du Nord. REUTER 
